message.content:
cs.AR, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.SE, cs.PF

This paper discusses the design and optimization of hybrid DRAM-NVM main memories, which falls under the category of computer architecture (cs.AR) and distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The proposed analytical model is based on Markov decision processes, which is a common technique used in control systems and optimization (cs.SY). The paper also discusses the impact of data migration policies on hybrid memory performance, which is related to software engineering (cs.SE) and performance analysis (cs.PF).
